item.description:
THE SECRET by Rhonda Byrne reveals the most poweful law in the universe. Yes! It is the Law of Attraction. Now I invite you all to discover what Byrne captured, in this FREE movie viewing by the same name. Let's all view 'THE SECRET" together.

  • Thursday, June 24, 2010
  • 6:30-8:30
  • Stoneham Public Library



If you have never seen it, IT IS A MUST SEE. If you have seen it before, there is something new to learn from it. We will have a brief discussion following the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in The Marcy Room located on the lower level

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Discovering "The Secret"
